    "number": 84957,
    "data": "2,2,2,2,1447,9769,17231,17231,32611,18527009,161205841,3123824801,26813406071,4398156030379,4398156030379",
    "name": "Initial prime of the first prime chain of length n under the iteration x -> 4x + 3.",
    "comment": [
        "This is a special case of prime chains generated by f(x) = c*x + d."
    ],
    "reference": [
        "D. H. Lehmer, On certain chains of primes, Proc. London Math. Soc. (3) 14a 1965 183-186."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(3) = 2 since 2, f(2) = 11, and f(11) = 47 are primes when f(x) = 4*x + 3."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "c[p_] := Block[{k=1, q=4*p+3}, While[ PrimeQ[q], q=4*q+3; k++]; k]; a[n_] := Block[ {p=2}, While[c[p] < n, p = NextPrime@ p]; p]; Array[a, 9] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 21 2017 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) has(p,n)=for(i=2,n, if(!isprime(p=4*p+3), return(0))); 1",
        "a(n)=forprime(p=2,, if(has(p,n), return(p))) \\\\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 20 2017"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A057330, A057331, A083388, A084954, A084955, A084956, A084958, A084959, A084960, A084961."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_W. Edwin Clark_, Jun 14 2003",
    "ext": [
        "a(11)-a(12) from _Donovan Johnson_, Sep 27 2008",
        "a(13) from _John Cerkan_, Jan 20 2017",
        "a(14)-a(15) from _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 21 2017"
